page.title: 09NATURAL ENVIRONMENT
page.content: Much of the landscape in and around Albrighton is flat.Most of the area is countryside as Albrighton is enclosed by a green belt.The introduction of the car brought about a lot of the housing development in Albrighton,as most people realised that they could buy a car and move into the country and away from the cities.Albrighton is a popular place as it is close to Birmingham and Wolverhampton.The major part of the population is comprised of older people because young married couples with children cannot afford to live here.Hence school numbers are falling.The green belt prevents any more growth so few new houses can be built in the village.There is little factory development the main industry being crops and dairy farming.
